import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import axios from "axios"; import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import {setMessageOpen, setMessageTitle, setMessageType} from "../../../state/MessageSlice"; import {useDispatch} from "react-redux"; export const LiveRedirect = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() const [events, setEvents] = useState([]) const setNotification = async (type, title) =>{ await dispatch(setMessageType(type)) await dispatch(setMessageTitle(title)) await dispatch(setMessageOpen(true, true)) } useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('/api/user/get-live-event') .then(res=>{ setEvents(res.data) }) .catch(error=>{ console.log(error) }) },[]) const handleEventStatus = (e, event)=>{ axios.patch(`/api/user/set-event-status/${event._id.toString()}`) .then(res=>{ setNotification(true, "Status updated") setTimeout(()=>{ window.location.reload(false); },(2000)) }) .catch(error=>{ console.log(error) setNotification(true, `${error.message}`) setTimeout(()=>{ window.location.reload(false); },(2000)) }) } return (
{events?.length === 1 && navigate(`/dashboard/live/${events.at(0)._id.toString()}`) } {events?.length > 1 &&

Live Events

{event.location}
 {event.isActive ? ( Active ): ( Not Active )} handleEventStatus(e,event)} className="text-red-400 hover:text-red-500 cursor-pointer"> Turn off handleEventStatus(e,event)} className="text-green-400 hover:text-green-500 cursor-pointer"> Turn on {navigate(`/dashboard/live/${event._id.toString()}`)}} className="text-sky-400 hover:text-sky-500 cursor-pointer"> Go Live
} {events?.length === 0 &&
you have no live events
}
) }
